titleInfo.title: Arthur Lang Stands in Front of his Father's Store

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: '#67, Arthur Lang, circa 1919, 2115 Larimer St. Donor Julia Brown''

mods.abstract: Arthur Lang is shown here wearing a white shirt, tie, and cap standing in front of the A. Lang Dry Goods Store located at 2115 Larimer Street in Denver.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 51.
Photograph was donated by Mrs. Julie Brown in February of 1977.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
